title: Enhanced changelog with full history
description: Improve ralph-whatsnew to show full version history and support --all flag.

acceptanceCriteria.text: Add RALPH_CHANGELOG associative array with version -> changes mapping
ralph-whatsnew shows current version details by default
ralph-whatsnew --all shows all versions from newest to oldest
Include at least v1.0.0, v1.1.0, v1.2.0, v1.3.0 in changelog
Format output with box drawing characters for nice display
